urls.title: Horror at destruction of nationally important UK river | The Wildlife Trusts
urls.description: Major damage to River Lugg in Herefordshire will be test case for Government commitment to strengthen wildlife protection.

tweets.text:
A mile of the River Lugg has been bulldozed to destruction.
Bankside trees grubbed out & burnt.
Riverbed scraped out.
Meanders reprofiled.
Disaster for downstream wildlife.
This was an SSSI.
No consent was sought. 
@EnvAgency must surely prosecute this.
RT
https://t.co/cSBhrR2nDW

FLOOD ALERT ‚ö†Ô∏è

A flood alert has been issued by the @EnvAgency for The Upper Stour and surrounding tributaries. 

For more information and the latest updates visit the flood warning information service.

https://t.co/zDzfVsfKQv https://t.co/gCDmTcq0c5

Terrible to hear about this eco-vandalism at #RiverLuggSSSI in #Herefordshire

It's a clear breach of environmental legislation, and test case for @DefraGovUK @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency enforcement

We @WildlifeTrusts will be following it very carefully https://t.co/YZpRTggpl4

urls.title: Environment Agency slashes number of water pollution incident visits

tweets.text: Guardian: @EnvAgency slashes number of water pollution incident visits amid rising fears water industry is now polluting UK rivers with impunity putting the health of river users and unique ecosystems at risk https://t.co/FbjqetyRzY via @Feargal_Sharkey @bilgribs

urls.title: Hereford & Worcester - Listen Live - BBC Sounds
urls.description: Catch up on your favourite BBC radio show from your favourite DJ right here, whenever you like. Listen without limits with BBC Sounds.

tweets.text:
Curiouser and curiouser.

The redoubtable @bettwsresident CEO of @WUFoundation making it very clear  that @EnvAgencyMids were alerted to the destruction that was taking place on the River Lugg last week. 

Did EA the respond? If not why not.

Starts 8:37

https://t.co/XbNCDTpqIL

FLOOD ALERT ‚ö†Ô∏è

A flood alert has been issued by the @EnvAgency for The River Colne from Great Yeldham to Colchester. 

For more information and the latest updates visit the flood warning information service.

https://t.co/EoBeE58rbj https://t.co/qflEsdw3FM
‚ö†Ô∏è Walcot Ford near Drakes Broughton is closed ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è https://t.co/Uelm7DgKrx

BEFORE & AFTER

Appalling #EcoVandalism at The #RiverLugg SSSI #Herefordshire

THIS IS ILLEGAL ACTIVITY

So it's a CRITICAL TEST CASE for environmental enforcement by @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK

urls.title: Horror at destruction of nationally important UK river | Herefordshire Wildlife Trust
urls.description: Major damage to River Lugg in Herefordshire will be test case for Government commitment to strengthen wildlife protection.

tweets.text: The beautiful, wildlife-rich River Lugg is a SSSI yet this is what a stretch of it looks like today: huge damage which will take decades to repair. This river *should* be a real jewel in #Herefordshire‚Äôs countryside. Pics before & after https://t.co/d8MTBP1LDc @herefordtimes https://t.co/TRPoEqmbC6

@mark_crt @CRTNorthWest Which company did you work with? We had floating habitats installed through the @GroundworkCLM Love My River @EnvAgencyNW supported initiative and worked with @BiomatrixWater who were superb!
We're watching @EnvAgency https://t.co/vne2OG6gjf
River Lugg "devastation" https://t.co/FttGiKHfQT via @FacebookWatch The scene captured by @bbchw .

tweets.text: Catastrophic damage to River Lugg SSSI as river banks bulldozed & reprofiled and all bankside & riverside habitats obliterated.
